org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.zookeeper

Class ZookeeperLockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.zookeeper.ZookeeperLockManager

  • public class ZookeeperLockManager
extends Object
    Manages locks in zookeeper on dataset keys (uuids). Initial use is for the purposes of creating new occurrence keys. Note that this class is not thread-safe: each thread should create its own instance of this class (although they can (and should) all share the same CuratorFramework instance).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZookeeperLockManager(com.netflix.curator.framework.CuratorFramework curator)
      Create a new instance, one for every thread that wants lock access.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getLock(String datasetKey)
      Get a lock for the passed in dataset.
      void releaseLock(String datasetKey)
      Release a held lock on a dataset.
      void waitForLock(String datasetKey)
      A method that blocks until the lock for the requested dataset becomes available.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZookeeperLockManager

        @Inject
public ZookeeperLockManager(com.netflix.curator.framework.CuratorFramework curator)
        Create a new instance, one for every thread that wants lock access.
        Parameters:
        curator - a started curator that holds the zookeeper connection

    • Method Detail

      • getLock

        public boolean getLock(String datasetKey)
        Get a lock for the passed in dataset. If the lock has already been taken, or there is any error in the process of acquiring the lock, false will be returned.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - the dataset on which to lock
        Returns:
        true if the lock was acquired

      • waitForLock

        public void waitForLock(String datasetKey)
        A method that blocks until the lock for the requested dataset becomes available.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - the dataset on which to lock
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if there is an error communicating with Zookeeper

      • releaseLock

        public void releaseLock(String datasetKey)
        Release a held lock on a dataset. There is no danger in calling this method if the lock is not held.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - the dataset for which the held lock should be released
